body:
Comment 2: 
Your example is too convoluted. But, from what I can gather, you are saying that folder
with running executable cannot be deleted on Windows. And that is true, that is how
Windows works. You don't expect Go to *fix* that shortcoming. Do you? Maybe you are
after something else completely, but you need to try and explain it to me. Thank you.

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
